https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/44BiWEueOk4XKDqt2SYDSc8tNDl.jpg The wild West Berlin of the 1980s became the creative melting pot of pop subcultures: music, art and chaos. Before the Iron Curtain fell, anything and everything seemed possible. B-Movie: Lust & Sound in West-Berlin 1979-1989
